overview: Forget Ms. Jackson and her sun-shield nipple covered tit – this is the football show you’ll want to see. It has two kick-ass halves: The first a locker room orgy of seven players who know how to pass their balls, and the second a gang-bang that pits the pale-assed Josh Weston against ten rock-hard Latinos that will send you to the showers drenched to the bone - or boner.
title: Quarterback Sack
